p.span: Climax Springs R-IV Schools, in partnership with the community, strives to create an environment where every student is empowered and held accountable, with high expectations in regards to academics, core values, and citizenship.

font-size: 18pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 112, 192);

p.span: Virtual Learning Continues Through District’s Last Day (May 15th, 2020)

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: The ongoing spread of COVID-19 in our region requires school districts to make difficult decisions. These decisions are being made in the best interests of public health. In consultation with health department officials the Climax Springs R-IV District will extend the closure of schools throughout the district's last academic day May 15, 2020.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Our district understands this is an uncertain time. Please know that our goal in this closure is to assist our community in slowing the transmission of the COVID-19 virus. According to health officials, the practice of social distancing can slow the transmission of the virus. We must continue to support and care for one another.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: The extended closure impacts all extra and co-curricular activities including athletic competitions, practices, and after school programs and events.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: During this time if students need technology assistance please

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: to be redirect to the student technology issue form. Students will complete this form for assistance with the district's tech company (Albert K12). ​

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: All technology resources during the District Wellness Shutdown are located under the

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman";
